hadiths.text: Zaid b. Khalid al-Juhani reported the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) as saying:Anyone who performs ablution and performs his ablution well, and then he offers two rak’ahs of prayers in a way that he does not forget ( anything in it), will be forgiven all his past sins

chapter.ara-name: باب كَرَاهِيَةِ الْوَسْوَسَةِ وَحَدِيثِ النَّفْسِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Whispering Of The Soul Or The Wandering Of One's Thoughts Are Disliked During Prayer
